basics.name: Melissa Zellhuber
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I have been working as a software developer for five years, I love to create software that will impact people in a positive way. I am really passionate about music, technology and find myself motivated with challenges.

education.institution: Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education (ITESM)

highlights: Developed, tested and maintained multiple iOS and Web applications for different clients
Led and mentored junior developers, in particular leading them to adopt technologies such as Java, iOS, NoSQL and Git.
Evaluated other colleagues skills and design ability tests for developers.
Designed the architecture and implemented the iOS app that gives users the opportunity to discover the best restaurants and food trucks around the area.
Participant in ALPHA Startup Program - Web Summit 2016.
Implemented new functionality and gave support to Oracle EBS, the application that allows Oracle to run its business and global infrastructure.
This was carried out as part of the Costing/Fulfillment DevOps team.
Developed, tested and maintained multiple iOS and Web applications for different clients
Led and mentored junior developers, in particular leading them to adopt technologies such as Java, iOS, NoSQL and Git.

volunteer.summary: Web developer helping an non profit organization
highlights: Design and develop a web page for a non profit organization called Prospera, which teaches local entrepreneurs practical business skills. http://www.prosperando.org/

awards.title: Google Developer Challenge Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded to top 1000 Web Developer applicants for the Mobile Web Specialist Nanodegree Program.

awards.title: Informatics International Masters Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded by the The University of Edinburgh School of Informatics for tuition fees.

awards.title: CONACyT Postgraduate Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship for outstanding individuals who wish to pursue a postgraduate degree in a country other than Mexico.

awards.title: DevOps FY16 Q1 Award Winner
awards.summary: Award to celebrate the excellence in OAL DevOps employees.
